events.name: PlayerCharacter
events.comment: Sets what the player character currently is.

events.name: canSlide
events.comment: Check if the player can perform the Slide action.

events.name: Slowed
events.comment: Sets if the player is slowed down by any action.

events.name: isSliding
events.comment: Check if the player is currently sliding or not.

events.name: Invulnerable
events.comment: Checks if the player is currently invulnerable or not.

events.title: Player_Gaming
events.description: Controls what happens when the player is in a gaming level.

children.text: Check if is or not inside the object
This is the event that forces the player to go Right at all times.

events.title: Player_HUB
events.description: Controls the player in the Galpo Tecnolgico
